21641274321632227496.Text: Commercial potions are guaranteed effective. Most come in five commercial grades -- bargain, cheap, standard, quality, and exclusive -- increasing in effectiveness and duration according to quality and expense. Some potions come in only one grade; they produce a single effect, and are guaranteed effective. Adventurers lacking magic skills must rely on potions, scrolls, or enchantments when they require the benefits of magic effects.
